channel.title: Existing/running AP server supporting C2S to develop against?
channel.description:
Hi, I am trying to develop an AP client in angular. I need an AP server for that, are there any running public AP servers with implemented C2S API?
AFAIK Mastodon has not C2S implemented (https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/client-to-server-support-in-mastodon/644), neither has Pleroma (however we're discussing this at https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/want-to-build-an-activitypub-client-where-to-start/993/13).
Please tell me if you have any tip, thank you!
